name: coc-songs
description: Church of Christ Songs - Telugu & English Hymnal

scripts.build: powershell -Command New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path www -Force; Copy-Item index.html,song.html,style.css,app.js,songs.json,manifest.json,sw.js,logo.jpg -Destination www -Force; Copy-Item -Recurse -Force icons -Destination www\icons
scripts.cap:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync android
